CustomField.description: The 8 character Central Office Building CLLI Code (Common Language Location Identifier) that identifies the building where the 10 digit Local Routing Number Switch is located. All 10 digit telephone numbers with a Portability Status Code of "0" (indicating that this is not a ported number) will show the same Local Routing Number Switch Building as the Telephone Number Switch Building to further indicate that the 10 digit Telephone Number is not a ported number.
CustomField.label: Local Routing Number Switch Building
